Articles.Content:
Congrats again to the developers on release! May the next decade be full of new space kerbalnauts!

Anyway, First impressions with the game were pretty good, aside from the bugs everyone has already said (of which im sure will get ironed out in time). Although I would like to highlight a feature from KSP1 that i would like to see in the sequel.

it has to do with the abruptness of zooming the camera in and out, both in the map view and in flight. in the first game, this was a smoother transition rather than just a jump, and it made the game feel much smoother. I hope the same will be implemented for KSP2.

You're right, I miss the smooth zoom.
Add to that, it appears that the zoom out limit is much much smaller than KSP 1, I loved zooming out seeing half of the planet for 1 second checking my location while flying a plane then zooming back in.
